title: Aloof King and Cool (Acting) Queen - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Romance   Yaoi
tags: Ancient Times   Androgynous Characters   Aristocracy   Cross-dressing   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Royalty   Transported to Another World   Weak Protagonist   Younger Love Interests
author: Kasumi Ritsu   霞律
description:
The queen’s essential feature is this: [must be a woman or a feminine-looking man].

——- “No, no! That’s no good at all!”

This is the story of an unfortunate young man who tripped into a different world and had to become the Queen of the largest country in that world.

“Being held by a man is no joke!”

Thinking it’s impossible for him, he decides to act as someone with a cool personality!>
